EmailTemplate.name: Ignite 2015 - Surrey - 24/11
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015 - Last chance to get tickets to our biggest employability event of the year!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
The BIGGEST event in The Challenge Society calender in 2015 is less than three days away! Tickets for our FREE event are being reserved quickly so if you haven't already, get your ticket and get involved in this fantastic event! Check out all the amazing workshops and partners that you can be involved in!
The first 100 people to arrive on the day will get a FREE goody bag!
We have limited spaces available on our FREE coaches from Staines, Farnham and Redhill. Click here to sign up and reserve your seat!
WORKSHOPS
Managing Your Personal Finances with Barclays
An Introduction to Broadcasting with BBC Surrey
Customer Service and Visual Merchandising with Marks and Spencers
Have your CV checked at our CV Clinic!
Try your hand at Street Art with Zinc Styles
Find out about apprenticeships with Guildford College
And many more....
PROFESSIONAL NETWORKING
Come and talk to professionals from various different industries who will be available to speak to you about their careers!
We have professionals working in law, medicine, banking, finance, and technology.
Artists, engineers, teachers, retailers, broadcasters, and youth workers...
Learn more about different careers, the benefits and challenges, and how you can get there!
QUESTION TIME
Ask your questions to local councillors and community leaders at our Questions Time session.
Speak to representatives from The Conservative Party, Labour Party, Liberal Democrats, Green Party and the Residents Association.
This is a great chance for you to find out more about party policies and ask questions on issues that matter to YOU!
There will also be a prize for the best question!
COMPETITION TIME!
We want to give every NCS graduate the opportunity to be involved in Ignite - but we need your help! We need you to get online, into your school, back in touch with your wave and telling everyone about why they should also come down to Ignite!
The person who gets the most NCS graduates to sign up and attend on the day will win an IPad Mini! Winner!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information, opportunities and competitions.
If you have any questions either check out our shiny new website, or send me an email at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org!
Kay - Assistant Graduate Manager
